listing.listing_description:
_ Please note  Penthouse on Beach is staffed with an on-site property manager who will tend to your daily requests. The property manager has a desk at the main reception of the Villa where he/she may go from time to time to manage the business aspects of the property. If you prefer not to have anyone on-site during your stay for complete privacy, please inform your Villa Specialist as this can be arranged._

 Perched high above the exclusive Camps Bay enclave near Cape Town, Penthouse on Beach offers spectacular views of Table Bay, the Atlantic Ocean, and the white-sand beaches below. Its three beautiful bedroom suites sleep six, and its naturally elegant décor exude peace and class, making it an ideal choice for families and groups of friends seeking privacy and privileged vistas on this gorgeous coast of South Africa.

Your luxury villa features an outdoor terrace with comfortable loungers and an elevated infinite swimming pool, offering unparalleled ocean views. With a comfortable outdoor lounge and alfresco dining table as well, it's the ideal sanctuary for relishing the ocean breeze and glasses of delicious South African wine. Lovely lighting allows you to savor the fresh air well into the night.

Floor-to-ceiling glass doors open from the terrace into the villa's luminous interior. Here, the stunning views are the main show, with multiple comfortable lounge areas arrayed by large windows offering expansive bird's-eye vistas of the city, mountains, and ocean. The fully equipped kitchen also features inspiring views, as well as a comfortable breakfast bar, while the dining table offers the perfect setting for memorable dinners together. The villa's décor is exquisite throughout, with contemporary design themes and original artwork complemented by natural materials that root you to the beautiful land and seascapes surrounding you.

The villa's views and serene natural light continue in the sumptuous bedrooms, where each has a unique vantage of your unforgettable surroundings. The Deluxe Room features a double size bed, a private balcony, clear views of Robben Island, and an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, while both the Table View Room and the Ocean View room include queen beds and ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone shower and bath.

From the villa's high perch, you're within easy reach of the cultural and natural riches of Cape Town and its environs. Sunset Beach is just a five-minute walk down the road, while the beaches and nightlife of Camps Bay are an easy drive away. Cape Town itself is also just a short drive from your door, while just beyond the city is the vast and precious Table Mountain National Park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note: This home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.

Enjoy stylish city living amid ocean and mountain views at Artea. This Sea Point penthouse is a chic, contemporary space just minutes from the promenade, Clifton and Camps Bay beaches, and central Cape Town. Its open-plan design and three bedrooms make it ideal for a getaway with friends or a laid-back holiday with family.

Take in views from the ocean to Lion’s Head and the city from the villa’s private rooftop deck, which features a pool, sitting and dining areas, and a barbecue. A second balcony has additional space for dining. After the sun sets on a day of sightseeing, unwind in front of the TV, put a favorite album on the sound system or share photos via Wi-Fi.

Artea is laid out around an open-concept great room that’s flooded with light by floor-to-ceiling windows. There’s plenty of seating on the sleek sofa and lounge chairs or around the pedestal dining table, and the kitchen is fully equipped. A collection of original artwork complements the refined furnishings for an ambience of modern luxury.

The penthouse has one master suite with a king bed and en-suite bathroom, and two bedrooms with queen beds that share a bathroom. Like the great room, the bedrooms have large windows, laminate floors and their own art pieces, making each one a stylish haven.

With Camps Bay Beach within walking distance of this vacation rental, you’re just a few minutes away from a honeymoon-worthy stroll on the sand or dinner at an oceanfront restaurant. Make the short drive to Table Mountain and take the cable car to the top of this Cape Town icon, plan a hike or two around Lion’s Head and the Twelve Apostles, or drive into the city center and explore.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Crisp white and rounded off by its roofline, this deceptively simple villa floats above the Santorini coast. Built into the hillside’s volcanic soil, it’s been remodeled into a futuristic lair—and a hole cut from the ceiling to let the Greek-island sunshine filter through the hot tub and ripple on the walls. It’s a short drive to Thera and the seafood-restaurant-lined shores of Exo Yalos Beach.

Start each morning of your holiday at this vacation rental with the complimentary breakfast, then bring a book or headphones out to the furnished balcony overlooking the sea. There’s both a jetted plunge pool and a hot tub where you can soak while watching boats ply the waters below. And while the villa may have started as a cave, it’s fully in the 21st century with its smart TV, sound system, and Wi-Fi.

Wall-to-wall glass lets light pour into the open-concept living area—as does a skylight cut beneath the upper-level hot tub. The sunshine bounces off the polished concrete floors and white walls around a dining table for 4, a fully equipped kitchen hidden behind folding doors, and a sitting area with a sculptural coffee table.

Thanks to the open-plan layout, even the intimate bedroom at the back of this luxury property has ocean views. It also has a queen bed and a private ensuite bathroom, making it just right for a couple on their honeymoon or looking to relive it while in Greece.

The villa is a short drive from Thera, the island’s main town, where you can wander amid whitewashed houses, peer over the breathtakingly high cliffs at the edge of the city, or take a cable car down to the water’s edge. It’s also an easy trip to the volcano-dark sand of Exo Yalos Beach, where you can rent a lounger or dine on fresh fish and squid at a waterfront restaurant, and the family-friendly waters of Monolithos Beach.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Positioned to capture breathtaking sunsets and endless ocean views, villa Sonnekus enjoys its prestigious perch in the trendy Camps Bay area of Cape Town. With three luxurious bedrooms and stylish decor, this scenic apartment is perfect for a family getaway or couples retreat. The Camps Bay Beach area is well-known for its wide selection of restaurants and pristine beachfront, which is just a two-minute walk from Sonnekus.

Thoughtfully designed, this modern apartment has everything you’ll need to fall in love with Cape Town. The open main room contains the sleek corner kitchen, television lounge, formal dining table, and a door to the balcony. The dark wood flooring adds a touch of warmth to the calming white walls and stainless steel that decorate the main living area. You’ll appreciate Sonnekus’ modern designer furniture, which adds colorful accents throughout the apartment. And, wide, floor-to-ceiling windows frame beautiful views of the ocean and beach.

Sonnekus is outfitted with only the highest end appliances, fixtures, and finishings in its fully equipped kitchen, three bedrooms, and two bathrooms. If you’re thinking of hosting, the formal dining area has seating for four, and parking is available within the apartment’s gated property. Sonnekus’ other features include television, Wi-Fi, a sound system, and a balcony with an incredible ocean view.

After you’ve spent a day or two on Camps Bay Beach, and night trying out the different restaurants and bars in the surrounding area, head into downtown Cape Town for even more options, shopping, and exciting nightlife. If you’d like to get a lay of the land, take the ninety-minute hike up Lion’s Head, where you’ll be rewarded with a some of the best views in the city.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Breathtaking views over the Atlantic, resort-worthy outdoor living areas and contemporary architecture add up to a fantasy come true at Camps Bay Dream. Whether you’re entertaining as the sun sets over the ocean or relaxing after a day of sightseeing in Cape Town, leave it to this vacation rental to provide an ambience of laid-back luxury.

The panoramic views are best enjoyed from the villa’s three levels of private terraces facing the ocean. On the ground level, there’s a spectacular living space with shaded sitting and dining areas, an outdoor kitchen with a barbecue, an infinity pool and a deck with loungers in the sun; other levels feature sitting areas. Inside, the villa’s amenities range from the spa-worthy to the high-tech, including a sauna, Wi-Fi, grand piano and wine cellar.

Sleek and modern, the villa is laid out around an open-plan great room whose glass wall takes in vistas from the Twelve Apostles across Camps Bay to Lion’s Head and Table Mountain. In addition to the main-level sitting area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen, there’s a ground-level bar and kitchen area that opens to the pool terrace for easy entertaining.

There are four bedrooms in the main house and one in the guest house; together, they can accommodate parties of up to ten friends or family members. In the main house, there are three bedrooms with king beds and en-suite bathrooms, and one bedroom with a king bed and shared hall bathroom. With its king bed, en-suite bathroom and separate entrance, the guest house makes the perfect haven for the couple still on honeymoon.

With the boutiques, oceanfront restaurants and sugary sands of Camps Bay Beach just a 5-minute drive from the villa, you can spend more of your holiday enjoying the spectacular setting. If you’d like to explore beyond Camps Bay, it’s a short drive to Clifton Beach and the attractions of central Cape Town, from the V&A Waterfront to the famous Table Mountain cable car.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Relish the lush serenity of a private oasis in this exquisite Moroccan villa near Marrakech. Nestled amid expansive gardens, olive groves, and stately palms yielding to Atlas Mountain vistas, the villa's alfresco living spaces set an enchanting stage for wedding receptions, special events, or intimate gatherings with loved ones. Eight bedroom suites, oustanding spa faciliites, and 800 square meters of interior living space accommodate parties of sixteen, with two stand-alone guesthouses offering privacy to couples or small families. Situated along the prestigious Route Amizmiz, Villa Zin is an easy drive from the splendors of central Marrakech and some of the country's finest golf courses.

The 12,000-square-meter estate revolves around a lagoon-like swimming set between two alfresco dining areas. One features a long table and ample lounge beneath a rustic palm pavilion with gorgeous hanging lanterns and a charming dinner bell—an open-air banquet hall in a tropical glade. The second occupies the ample patio adjacent to the main house. Canopied sunbeds, elegant loungers, and a palm-strung hammock line the sparkling water, inviting you to delicious days and nights under the clear sky.

A glass wall with wide threshold joins the dining patio with the main house, allowing the interior to breathe the fragrant air. Sumptuous sofas invite you to evening aperitifs overlooking the pool, while a hearth-warmed parlor and study will keep you toasty after nightfall. Separate from these living areas, the villa's spa includes a massage room, traditional Hammam, and modern, well-equipped gym enclosed by garden-view windows.

The main house includes three garden-level bedrooms opening to the terrace. Warm fireplaces and traditional Moroccan decorative details such as tadelakt walls, hendira rugs, batik textiles, and Berber-inspired furnishings cast a dreamy ambiance. Each of the two stand-alone guest apartments enjoys a private entrance, furnished terrace, and sixty square meters of living space. One, known as the Shadow Pavilion, includes two bedrooms nestled amid bougainvillea. The three-bedroom Musk Pavilion is adjacent to the gym.

Villa Zin blends exclusive privacy with outstanding proximity to the finest destinations in and around Marrakech. You're a short drive to Royal Golf Marrakech and Amelkis, while Jemma El Fna square in the old city's Medina quartier is a half-hour away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Villa Yenmoz is located in an enclosed park sector of Bab Atlas Palmeraie, just five minutes outside of Marrakech. Although close to the city, once you enter Yenmoz lush, expertly manicured grounds, you’d never know it. Designed to promote tranquility, serenity, and relaxation, Villa Yenmoz is the perfect host for a retreat with friends or colleagues, as well as any other special event that requires outdoor space.

Traditional and authentic Moroccan design is showcased on the Yenmoz estate. Inspired by the red-clay houses of Morocco’s ancient villagers, Yenmoz is a unique vacation spot for visitors who wish to immerse themselves in the local culture. Beautiful works of art add splashes of color to the warm and inviting living room. Decorated with designer furniture and high-end electronics, this villa manages to maintain modern elegance and luxury, while portraying Morocco’s natural, slightly rustic influence. The kitchen, however, is all modern and sure to inspire your inner chef with its state of the art appliances and functional layout.

Inside, you’ll find the villa’s fully equipped kitchen, with state of the art appliances, and a breakfast table. The formal dining area and the alfresco set both have seating for eight. After dinner, spend the night on the terrace, enjoying the gardens, and maybe a late-night swim. If you’d prefer a night in, Yenmoz has a television, a wood burning fireplace, air conditioning, and Wi-Fi. And, the villa comes with a butler, daily cleaning service, security, and airport transfer.

When it’s time to venture beyond the walls of Yenmoz, you won’t have far to travel before you’re engulfed by the vibrant downtown core of Marrakech. Start with the square of Djemaa El-Fna if you want to jump right into the excitement, you’ll find musicians, dancers, snake charmers, and hundreds of stalls serving up unique local delicacies and souvenirs. Right next to the square is The Souks, Marrakech’s main marketplace, where you can buy almost anything.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Tucked away in a secluded alcove of Megalochori, within a short stroll from the village square, Villa Io is an ideal hideaway providing peace and privacy. Built into the volcanic rock, the villa once served as the village school to the local children. Today the interior is postcard-perfect, white with beautiful arched interiors. The outdoor area is private and the hand-laid cobbled courtyard complemented by a glistening pool, provides the perfect outdoor space for lazing around on hot summer days. This traditional villa ensures tranquility and a taste of traditional village life. Villa Io is ideal for families looking to experience the true island lifestyle of days gone by without compromising on comfort or convenience.

Out in the sunshine you can cool down in the swimming pool, enjoy some al fresco dining or just lounge around with a good book and take it easy. The property comes with a 24 hour concierge and daily maid service. In terms of amenities, you can kick back and watch satellite television or a DVD after you’ve enjoyed another super day in sunny Santorini.

The layout of the villa takes the form of traditional Santorini houses. As the village of Megalochori is surrounded by vineyards, the villa continues this theme with unusual light fittings fashioned out of the basket-like vines. The farm-style kitchen is large and fully equipped with an antique dining table and beautifully crafted chairs and modern appliances. Cutlery and crockery are housed in an ornate antique dresser, adding an old-world charm to the kitchen. Through an arched passageway, leading from the kitchen, you will find the comfortable living room with doors leading out to the courtyard and pool.

Villa Io accommodates up to six guests and children are welcome. The two main bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, while there is a further sleeping area in the loft with two single beds, ideally suited for children over six years old.

There’s a lot to see and do away from the villa during your vacation. You can enjoy a day out at the beach, people-watch in Megalochori village, charter your own boat for the day and take to the ocean (extra costs apply and advance notice may be required) or drive into nearby Fira and Oia and sample a livelier pace of life. Villa Io is a welcoming place to return to each evening.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Just a few kilometers outside of the bustling city of Marrakesh, this peaceful vacation villa exists in unparalleled privacy, especially considering its convenient location. With six en-suite bedrooms and an abundance of indoor/outdoor living space, Dar Moucha is the perfect home base for exploring Morocco with friends, a large family get-together, or a unique destination wedding.

Dar Moucha is a house built as if it grew from the ground. A space that exists harmoniously with its natural surroundings. Orange trees, an orchard, a small farm, and an organic vegetable patch provide fresh produce from guests of the villa. An open-air design ensures fresh breeze and natural sunlight fill the interior spaces. In the living room, you’ll find modern designer furniture, calming decor, and high-end electronics. The bedrooms feature more of the same, each coming with a king-sized bed and en-suite bathroom.

Lush gardens and beautiful palm trees line the outside of Dar Moucha’s incredible pool, providing shade and privacy to the exciting island lounge area within the pool. A great feature of this villa is the ability to accommodate the entire group in all of its unique settings. From the pool island to the grand foyer, spacious living room, and formal dining area, there’s space for everyone. There’s also a few more secluded spots, like the hammam and the fire pit, great for some alone time with someone special. The villa also comes equipped with Wi-Fi, air conditioning, an exercise room, satellite television, and breakfast.

There are lots of exciting ways to discover Marrakesh’s beautiful environment. Horseback tours, camel tours, mountain treks, and hot air balloon rides are all available at Marrakesh Resort. Skiing is available on Atlas Mountain, which is just a few kilometers past the Marrakesh Palmeraie. And, if there’s a golfer in the group, Ryads Al Maaden Medina and Amelkis golf courses are about twelve kilometers from home.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
When your backdrop is the Twelve Apostles Mountain range, and your view is an endless Atlantic Ocean panorama, you'd hope that a little extra thought goes in during construction. Luckily for you, the 008 Villa is an architectural masterpiece, totally fitting of its amazing natural surroundings. Located just south of Clifton Beach, with views of Lion's Head, 008 Villa enjoys extremely convenient proximity to all of Cape Town's main attractions. And, it's just a five-minute walk from Camp's Bay Beach.

Tuck away 008 Villa's floor-to-ceiling doors and the entire main level opens to the terrace and the gorgeous environment beyond. The living room, two dining areas, and kitchen flow seamlessly to the terrace, which adds alfresco dining, sun loungers, and a swimming pool to the already expansive hosting space. This common area's minimalistic decor, consisting of modern designer furniture and a grey scale color scheme, is a stylish representation of simplistic elegance. With a space so perfect for hosting, you and your guests may never want to leave.

The perfect vacation spot for large groups, 008 Villa places as much importance on privacy as it does space. All six bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms, king or queen-sized beds, and their own private entrances.

With such an incredible view from 008 Villa's terrace, it won't be hard to find your way around the beautiful beach community of Camp's Bay, and on past Lion's Head to Cape Town. From the villa driveway to the city center is just a fifteen-minute drive. Once downtown, you'll love the vibrant atmosphere, seemingly limitless choice of restaurants and bars, trendy cafes, and boutique shops. If you're looking for adventure, Cape Town has that covered too. Shark cage diving, skydiving, paragliding, and rock climbing are all easily accessible options in this exciting city.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The ultra-modern Spa House in secluded Hout Bay is a dazzling three-bedroom villa within easy reach of Cape Town. Designed by an award-winning architect, this property’s floor-to-ceiling glass walls provide spectacular views of the rugged Cape Peninsula Mountain Ranges. With manicured lawns and an oasis-like pool surrounding the sun-kissed façade this is a haven of light, leisure and luxury. Enjoy the best of South African vacations in a shimmering, stylish setting.

Surrounded by the iconic hills and azure blue skies of one of South Africa’s most popular coastal strips, Spa House radiates relaxation.  You are just a short drive from the sea at Hout Bay, a fishing village teeming with character, restaurants, trawlers and yachts. The vast Atlantic Ocean plays host to this idyllic community and a range of sea life including a seal colony. Explore Hout Bay before returning to your retreat in the hills and the best seats in the house for the Cape’s spectacular sunsets.

Enjoy the epitome of modern living with impressive open plan areas blending seamlessly into the outdoors. Towering glass walls provide you with unobstructed views of the jagged mountains. Your main pool deck, dotted with sun loungers, appears to float on an infinite blue lagoon. The mini deck is an adventurous hop across stepping stones. The villa’s enervating marble-clad spa includes steam and massage rooms designed to soothe the soul. It’s time to relax with a book, dive into the clear blue water or be invigorated by your surroundings.  

Spa House’s sumptuous bedrooms greet you with magnificent views across the mountains, Hout Bay and the lush garden. Light floods every corner of Spa House but at night you can roll down the blinds and cloak yourself with peace and quiet. Each bedroom is bright and airy with top of the range en-suite bathrooms adding a touch of glamour.  Air conditioning helps moderate the heat of summer and chilly nights. After a day of Cape discovery there’s no better place to be than in your soft and welcoming king-sized bed.

You are in a prime position to make the most of the Cape here at Spa House. Sea adventure and lively nightlife are on offer in popular Hout Bay. The imperious hills rise before you, hinting at the jagged range which features mist-shrouded icon Table Mountain. Close by you can explore the city attractions of bustling Cape Town. But with so much to relish in this hidden gem of a villa you can be forgiven for spending a leisurely day by the pool.

listing.listing_description:
Luxurious Tree Villa, located in the heart of Camps Bay, can be your very own mansion in Cape Town. Its prominent location provides unobstructed views across one of South Africa’s best beaches and the Twelve Apostles mountain range. Recently renovated without losing the character of a classic Camps Bay property, it also benefits from a large pool and sheltered terrace to help you enjoy the Cape’s sun-kissed days and temperate evenings.

As soon as you encounter Tree Villa you get a sense of space and grandeur. Nestling between the jagged peaks of the Apostles and the rooftops of Camps Bay this is a villa with plenty of character and total privacy. Two floors of ocean-facing windows look directly out to sea, a traditional garden teems with plants and birdsong and the azure pool glistens in the sunlight. Less than 15 minutes away you’ll find shops, bars and restaurants and Camps Bay’s famous white sands and surf.

Tree Villa is a well- established Camps Bay holiday home that makes superb use of its hillside location. From the impressive fresh white exterior with its curved balconies to the airy living room with breath-taking panoramic ocean views this is a dwelling on a grand scale. The large, fully-equipped kitchen, dining areas set against the backdrop of the Atlantic Ocean and wood-fuelled fireplace epitomize the air of luxury. As the sun rises it’s hard to resist the lure of the shimmering pool surrounded by relaxing sun loungers.

The villa’s four bright and airy bedrooms are havens of peace, providing an uncluttered and calming environment for a great night’s sleep. The master bedroom features a king-sized bed and leads on to an en-suite bathroom with a shower and tub. It also opens onto a private balcony with spectacular views of the Cape coastline. Interconnecting with a second bedroom this makes it the ideal suite for a young family. The remaining bedrooms are both en-suite and boast their own private balcony or patio, giving you even more space and breathing room.

Here, perched high above Camps Bay, you can have lofty aspirations of an outstanding vacation in Cape Town. The surf and white sands of Camps Bay will lure you to enjoy lazy days on the beach and   the boutique shops and cafes are equally attractive. Cape Town’s attractions are also very close. Looming large on the horizon is Table Mountain, a must-see icon whether shrouded in misty cloud or bathed in sunlight.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This luxurious three-bedroom villa is perfectly poised to embrace the unique panorama of mountain scenery merging into the far-reaching sea. Almyra is perched majestically overlooking deep blue waters below that sparkle in the Cretan sunlight. When you stay here, you’ll enjoy the security and privacy of being in a gated community with private parking. To get the most from your vacation in this captivating part of Crete, it’s recommended you hire a rental car to bring you from Chania airport which is 40 minutes away.

The amenities within the villa make it feel like a true home from home with little touches such as a hairdryer, soft bathrobes, slippers and luxury toiletries all adding to the experience. When the sun goes down for the day, you can gather around the fireplace and talk about the great day you’ve had. Indoors, there’s plenty of technology to keep you busy and outside, you’ll love the swimming pool, pergola and option of al fresco dining using the gas grill to prepare delicious local fish, meat and vegetables.

Contemporary and traditional architecture are combined to feature light wooden floors, expanses of glass, modern steel-framed pergolas with wood paneling and natural stone walls. Crisp whites and smooth grays teamed with accents of stainless steel complete the sleek, stylish finish of the minimalist interior. Huge glass doors open onto the grand swimming pool terrace that appears to float over the sea below and beyond. Relax in the heavenly luxury and feel your cares drifting away.

The master bedroom has a television and king size bed and is served by an en-suite bathroom with a jetted tub. The other two bedrooms have twin beds which can be easily converted into kings if required. If you wake up feeling energetic or like to work out before you drop off to sleep, bedroom three has its own mini exercise room.

Almirida Village and the blissful beach are both a 5 minute walk from Almyra, so you can sit and people-watch in the shade, or lounge in the sunshine for a while listening to the waves softly lapping on the shoreline. There’s a restaurant and grocery store 10 minutes away on foot, when you want to indulge in some of the fine, authentic produce this part of Crete has to offer.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The quintessential rock, sea and sky of the Greek islands appear in all their glory at Villa Etheras. This cliffside Santorini vacation rental was named for ether, believed by the ancient Greeks to be the mystical fifth element from which the world was created along with air, fire, earth and water—and, in their mythology, the pure air breathed by the gods. When you sample its panoramic views, gorgeous terrace and chic interiors, you may enjoy a spiritual experience, too.

Set into the rock of the hillside, the villa’s private oceanfront terrace commands views over the caldera and along the coast. Gather around the shaded dining table, stretch out on a seat in the sun or cool off in the infinity pool, which features a lounging platform that appears to be floating on the water’s surface. Inside, a TV, sound system, DVD player, Wi-Fi and air conditioning round out the amenities at this luxury property.

The white stucco walls so characteristic of the islands are carried into Villa Etheras, where they wind around an open-concept living room and kitchen. A sleek fireplace surround and polished marble coffee table contrast with the soft slipcovered sofa in the living room; in the fully equipped kitchen, a rock slab is a rugged counterpoint to the minimalist cabinets and breakfast bar.

The villa’s two bedrooms are the perfect size for a small family or two couples on holiday together—or even for an indulgent honeymoon in the Santorini sun. Both bedrooms have king beds, en-suite bathrooms and sea views.

With a location in the quiet village of Firostefani, Villa Etheras is a short drive from the larger town of Fira and scenic, unpretentious Exo Yalos beach. When it’s time to leave your island retreat, plan on a 7-mile drive from the villa to the ferry docks at Athinios Port Santorini.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Among our more private luxury villas in Crete, the three bedroom Villa Filira overlooks the region’s olive groves and gentle rolling hills. This villa is well-suited to either a couple seeking privacy, or a family vacation. Villa Filira offers its guests beautiful panoramic views of the coast and surrounding Cretan countryside and is conveniently located less than two miles from the village and the nearest beach. The property can accommodate up to six guests with plenty of space to spread out.

A wealth of indoor and outdoor amenities awaits you at this secluded villa. The infinity pool, gas barbecue and gazebo make outdoor living fun and relaxing. Inside there’s Wi-Fi access, satellite television, stereo system with music collection and a lot more to make your stay an extremely pleasant one. Electronic gates lead you into the property and there’s a secure garage area for your rental car.

Built over three floors, Villa Filira’s interiors are decorated in an inviting country style with a contemporary twist. Refined yet inviting, this villa’s cream and earthy tones create a relaxing and peaceful space. If you enjoy cooking, there’s a wonderful wood oven in the traditional-looking kitchen, as well as more modern appliances such as microwave, espresso machine and dishwasher.

The three bedrooms enjoy air conditioning and each has its own television. In addition to the soft, comforting bed linen, each room has a big added bonus – access to a private outdoor terrace or veranda. Picture yourself, chilled drink in hand, watching the lights shimmer in the distance and breathing in the freshest of air as you wind down for the day. In the morning, there’s no better place than this for admiring the ocean and considering the possibilities of the new day ahead over a strong coffee or glass of fresh orange juice.

One of the many marvelous features of this property is its seclusion without forfeiting its proximity to local amenities. The village of Kolymbari is only 2 km away and has a supermarket, bank and curvaceous coastline. A rental car is recommended so you can go off for day trips to nearby towns and villages while enjoying unrivaled views of the Cretan shoreline. When you want to escape from modern life for a while and take it easy in tranquil surroundings, Villa Filira is for you.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Standing gracefully on 3,000 square meters of gorgeous orchards and landscaped garden near Kolymvari and Chania, the three-bedroom Villa Ianira is a luxury sanctuary with stunning views of the Sea of Crete and White Mountains, offering exquisite privacy and ample space for indoor and outdoor entertainment.

The villa's unique design combines ancient elegance, contemporary lines, and cutting-edge principles of environmental harmony. The outdoor terrace features two swimming pools and wide views of the sea and islands. Beside it, under the villa's eaves, the large outdoor lounge is ideal for spending long days and evenings relishing the ocean breeze. The covered alfresco dining table for eight, beside the rustic wood-burning oven and barbeque, is where you'll savor nighttime dinners and lunches in the cool shade. Beyond the terrace, amid the gardens and groves, you'll find lush lawns for sunbathing and a charming playground for children.

Indoors, under high, vaulted ceilings, the open-plan living area features a comfortable lounge surrounding a wood-burning fire place and satellite television. With the dining table beside it, ample floor space, and a sound system, the living area welcomes long dinner parties with fine Greek wine and cuisine. Through an antique archway, you'll find the fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar and splendid exposed masonry. The villa's beautiful wood floors and dreamy lighting create the ideal ambience for enjoying time together with family and friends.

The soft tones and natural light of the tastefully minimalist bedrooms will keep you cool during the day and cozy at night. The master bedroom features a king size bed and ocean views from its windows and private balcony, as well as ensuite bathroom with stand-alone bathtub. The second bedroom has two single beds, while the third has a king. Each has an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone shower, and they share a covered terrace.

Beyond the self-contained paradise of Villa Ianira, you're just moments away from the beaches and charm of the western Cretan coast. Hop in your car and drive two minutes to Kolymarvi Beach and Kolymarvi Village, or twenty minutes to Chania, with its restaurants, bars, museums, and breathtaking architecture combining Greek, Roman, and Venetian influences.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With breathtaking views of the distant Atlas Mountains and an incredibly spacious resort-like private property, it’s hard to imagine that Villa Mexance is just a few minutes outside of Marrakech. Perfect for a special event, like a retreat, family reunion, or destination wedding, Mexance features eight, very private, en-suite bedrooms, a vast property, and several large lounge area made for group gatherings.

Mexance’s living spaces and bedrooms are positioned around the large property’s centerpiece, a gorgeous, palm tree-lined, swimming pool. Laid out in compound-like style, the interior spaces are divided into two main house, both with numerous openings to the terrace. Fresh air and natural sunlight are ever-present throughout Mexance’s entire estate. The lounge areas are decorated with modern, elegant furniture and state of the art electronics, while the architectural design pays homage to Moroccan tradition. The common spaces are generous enough to fit your whole group comfortably, but should you desire a little privacy, the massage room, hammam, and fitness room are all great getaways.

Outside, the mountain view and the expertly manicured gardens set the stage for an unforgettable vacation. You’ll love exploring the vast property and relaxing by the pool. To make your stay even easier, Mexance has a cleaning service, butler, and daily housekeeping. And, Wi-Fi, satellite television, and air conditioning are included as well.

Take a day trip to Ait Ben Haddou, an ancient village famous for its traditional red clay house, and you’ll see where Mexance may have borrowed some inspiration. Now, a UNESCO heritage site, this ancient village is one-of-a-kind, and perfect for fans of historic architecture. For some fun in the city, Marrakech is just minutes from Mexance. There are many options for activities and excursions through villa management that will help navigate your way to Marrakech’s shopping, dining, adventure tourism, nightlife, historic sites, and more. And, if there’s a golfer in your party, Amelkis Golf Course is just a few minutes by car.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note: Villa Rhea can be rented together with Villa Kronos (https://www.luxuryretreats.com/vacation-rentals/greece/crete/kokkino-chorio/villa-kronos-121109), to make up Titans Villa (https://www.luxuryretreats.com/vacation-rentals/greece/crete/kokkino-chorio/titans-villa-121126). Inquire with your Villa Specialist today for more details!

Tucked into the lush hillside of Kokkino Chorio, this luxurious Greek villa has the proximity of a resort and the privacy of a family home. Just minutes from two gorgeous beachfront areas, the quaint fishing village of Plaka, and the bustling city life of Chania, Villa Rhea encompasses every aspect of the Greek Island lifestyle. And, with dynamic views of the Ocean, hillside, and distant mountains, you’re sure to feel at one with the natural elements of your serene surroundings.

Villa Rhea combines ancient building materials, like stone and wood, with modern-minimalistic design to create a unique take on traditional Greek homes. The decor is made simple with a natural color scheme with hints of turquoise reminds you that the beautiful Ocean is just outside. Large glass doors open to the terrace, allowing the fresh Ocean breeze to fill the interior spaces. The living room features comfortable, designer furniture and an elegant chandelier above, hanging from the vaulted ceiling. The kitchen is fully equipped with high-end appliances, plenty of countertop workspace, and an espresso machine.

Relaxation is imminent at Villa Rhea. With a private, hydro massage swimming pool, and sunny afternoons in a lounge chair, there’s no room for stress. In fact, the toughest decision you’ll have to make is whether to eat inside or out. Both the formal dining space and the alfresco set have seating for six. After dinner, unwind in the living room and watch some television, play a video game, throw something soothing on the sound system, or just pick a book from the library and enjoy the air conditioning.

When it’s time to head to the beach, consider Kalives Seaside Resort, just eighteen kilometers from Kronos. It’s a bustling beachfront community with plenty of restaurants, bars, and shopping, all along the beachfront. For a more laid-back outing, visit Plaka. Well known for its traditional Cretan cuisine, family owned taverns, and wild landscapes, Plaka is a great spot for an afternoon or evening trip.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This three bedroom luxury villa enjoys a large private infinity pool with spectacular views of the sea towards Souda Bay and panoramic views of the White Mountains. Anemos is only a 5 minute walk into town and the nearest beach so you can enjoy a leisurely and scenic stroll down the hill. The property is as welcoming inside as it is striking from the outside. What’s more, it’s only a 33 km drive from Chania Airport, so it won’t be long before you’re settled in and enjoying everything it has to offer for a memorable vacation.

All your senses will be awakened by the sheer natural beauty of this villa. The unmistakable aroma of a delicious barbecue, fresh off the grill, is carried on the fresh mountain air and mingles with the scent of the lemon trees for a romantic dining experience under the stars, overlooking the private infinity pool. The interior of Anemos is modern with first class amenities. Satellite television, Wi-Fi access and a DVD player are there for your entertainment and if you’re feeling like you want to burn off some of those vacation calories you’ve consumed, there’s fitness equipment in the property for your exclusive use. Just remember not to overdo it, you’re here to relax and enjoy yourself!

Wooden floors, rich fabrics and warm colors provide the ideal environment for a selection of family-owned antique furniture, while glass-enclosed marble bathrooms add modern refinement. There are some cool splashes of blue throughout which complement the unmissable sea views.

When you need to sleep off a hard day’s relaxing or sightseeing, there are three air conditioned bedrooms which will make you feel right at home. Two of the rooms have en-suite facilities and all of them have televisions so you can watch a movie or a show before drifting off peacefully ahead of another incredible day in Crete. One bedroom has a king size bed with the other two containing two twin beds which can be converted to kings on request.

If you can tear yourself away from the various attractions of this wonderful villa, you’ll find a lot to pack into your photo collection just a short trip away. The town is a great place to spend some time and sit with a cold drink watching the world go by. If lying on the beach doing very little is your thing, you’ll only have to venture five minutes from your doorstep before soaking up some rays.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find a private enclave just a few miles outside the bustling center of Marrakech at Dar Tifiss. Set on more than an acre of lush gardens in the Bab Atlas area, this gorgeous Morocco vacation rental boasts space for ten in its more than 5,000 square feet of living space and five bedrooms. Let the full-time staff pamper you, so you can enjoy more time with friends and family.

The staff includes a butler and housekeeper who will attend to your needs throughout your holiday. Spend your time swimming in the pool, lounging on the sunny terrace, trying your luck on the pétanque court, stretching out in the exercise and massage rooms, or swapping stories around the al-fresco dining table. The villa also has a TV, sound system and Wi-Fi.

Thanks to a recent renovation, the villa’s interiors feel bright and sophisticated. The open-concept living and dining areas are separated by a double-sided fireplace, and feature several sets of French doors to the terrace, geometric fabrics and artwork, and plenty of seating. There is a fully equipped kitchen, but it is exclusively for staff use.

There are four bedrooms in the main house at this luxury property and one in a guest house with a separate entrance; all five have en-suite bathrooms. The main house has one bedroom with a king bed, one bedroom with two twin beds, and two bedrooms with queen beds. In the guest house, you’ll find two twin beds, plus a fireplace and lounge area.

While Dar Tifiss is quiet and welcoming, it’s not far from activities and attractions. Avid players will appreciate the short drive to Atlas Golf Resort and Golf Amelkis, while sightseers won’t want to miss a visit to the always-lively Jemaa el-Fna public square. Wander the streets of the medina in Marrakech, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, then sit down to a honeymoon-worthy dinner in one of the city’s up-and-coming restaurants.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Panoramas of sea, sky and spectacular sunsets are on view from Erossea Villa. Set on the west side of Santorini in the picturesque village of Imerovigli, this west-facing vacation rental looks out across the brilliant blue waters of the Aegean. Reserve this newly renovated three-bedroom property for a honeymoon-worthy romantic getaway or a relaxed family holiday in the sun.

Your stay at this luxury villa begins with an airport transfer and includes breakfast each day. Take in the vistas from outdoor living spaces with a heated pool, hot tub, loungers in the sun, and shaded sitting and dining areas. A wireless speaker means you can listen to a favorite playlist indoors and out, and Wi-Fi makes it easy to share photos from your trip.

Taking inspiration from the traditional Greek village scenes on postcards, the villa is built into the hillside at the top of the caldera. Fresh white stucco forms the backdrop for the open-plan living and dining areas, which are flooded with sunlight from glass doors leading to the terrace and furnished with chic mid-century-style pieces. A fully equipped kitchenette is tucked into the open-concept space as well.

Erossea Villa has two bedrooms with queen beds in the main villa—one with an en-suite bathroom and one with a hall bathroom—and one in a guest suite with its own queen bed and en-suite bathroom. Accessed via an exterior staircase, the guest suite is a private retreat within the property.

From the villa’s setting in the village of Imerovigli, it’s a short drive to the island’s capital and several beaches, including the pebbled shores of Kamari and the black sands of Perissa. Don’t miss the chance to glimpse Santorini’s long history on a walk through the ruins at nearby Ancient Thira.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Recently renovated, this two-hundred-year-old Cape Dutch Homestead was the original home of Oldenburg Vineyards. Located in the Banghoek Valley amongst lush gardens and scenic mountain landscape, The Homestead maintains a high level of privacy thanks to its dynamic natural features. Drive ten minutes to the East, and you’ll find the university town of Stellenbosch, home to many of South Africa’s finest restaurants, and the current home of Oldenburg Vineyards. With six luxurious bedrooms, a spacious interior layout, and a vast estate, The Homestead is the perfect home base for South African exploration.

Popularized by Dutch settlers in the seventeenth-century; The Homestead displays classic Cape Dutch architecture with its whitewashed walls and dormer windows. Inside, the white-theme continues, but with a modern twist. Straight lines, an open-concept floor plan, and integrated state of the art appliances and electronics usher The Homestead into the new age. Every room is outfitted with designer furniture, contemporary art, and windows that frame picturesque mountain views. In the kitchen, extra-high vaulted ceilings add to the spacious atmosphere. And in the living room, the fireplace reminds guests of simpler times.

At dinner, The Homestead has seating for twelve in the formal dining area and at the alfresco set on the terrace. Outside, the generous lawns, gardens, and landscaped areas are perfect for afternoon strolls. And, the swimming pool is a great place to relax and beat the afternoon heat. Back inside, The Homestead comes equipped with an espresso machine, air conditioning, television, an office area, and Wi-Fi. And, the villa features a lengthy list of included services and amenities.

Nearby, in Stellenbosch, you’ll find incredible locally-owned restaurants, and plenty of wine tasting rooms in the many vineyards on the way. One unique restaurant in town is Zevenwacht Picnic baskets, offering lunch baskets to be enjoyed on their sloping lawns that overlook a nearby lake. For bustling city-life, travel about an hour to Cape Town where you’ll find a wide range of shopping, dining, and nightlife.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Stay in luxury on the shores of Crete at Elounda Villa. Set on the beach of the calm Gulf of Mirabello near the town of Elounda, the villa has extraordinary views across the bay and offers guests access to the amenities at a nearby private beach club and hotel. Four bedrooms, contemporary architecture and extensive outdoor living areas all make the property a gracious and stylish retreat.

Step through the villa to discover the covered outdoor dining area, pool with waterfall feature, and terrace with chaise longues. Stroll across the lawn to the beachfront terrace, which has several pairs of chaise longues under umbrellas and a covered sitting area. A barbecue and jetted tub round out the outdoor living spaces. Inside, the villa has a TV, sound system and Wi-Fi access for evenings in, and heating, air conditioning and a fireplace for comfortable nights.

The open-plan living room, dining room and kitchen take advantage of the villa’s setting by opening to the terrace for beautiful water views. At one end of the living room, bergere chairs are tucked around a stone fireplace; at the other, a cozy sofa and wingback chair are pulled around the TV. The elegant carved-leg dining table can seat up to eight and is set, farmhouse-style, in the middle of the contemporary, fully equipped kitchen.

Each of the four bedrooms at Elounda Villa has air conditioning and a TV. There are two master suites with queen beds and en-suite bathrooms; one has a walk-in closet and sitting area as well. The other two bedrooms each have two twin beds. For families traveling together, a baby cot is available.

Though the villa is located right on the Gulf of Mirabello, you can also make the short 2.5-mile drive to Elounda Beach. The nearest towns are Elounda, just over a half-mile away, Plaka, 3 miles away, and Agios Nikolaos, 7 miles away. Catch a ferry at the ports of Heraklion, 45 miles away, or Sitia, 50 miles away, or a plane at Heraklion-Nikos Kazantzakis International Airport, a 43-mile drive, or Sitia Airport, a 50-mile drive from the villa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Spend lazy days in the pool and nights manning the barbecue—all in full view of the ocean—at Villa 196. Designed for entertaining, this modern vacation rental in Cape Town’s exclusive Bantry Bay neighborhood is an ideal retreat for groups of friends or family. Of course, if you’d like to explore, it’s also just a short drive from some of the city’s top attractions.

You’ll want to spend most of your holiday on the villa’s expansive terrace, complete with a swimming pool, plenty of loungers and a barbecue area. Inside the house, you’ll find a home theater, games and exercise rooms, a pool table, TV, sound system and Wi-Fi. Your stay even includes the services of a private chef and housekeeper.

Sliding glass doors are all that separates the terrace from the L-shaped great room, letting you open it up into one seamless indoor-outdoor living space. Modern silhouettes lend sophistication in the sitting and dining areas, and the fully equipped kitchen has a convenient breakfast bar. Wood-paneled ceilings inside and out add to the feeling that it’s all one large room.

Each of the five bedrooms at this luxury property is a honeymoon-worthy retreat with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, balcony, and air conditioning. Let yourself be enchanted both by the bedrooms’ contemporary style—think sleek fireplaces, patterned rugs and leather accent chairs—and the views of the Atlantic from their oversized windows.

If you’re in search of sand to go with your sun, it’s only a 15-minute walk from Villa 196 to stylish Clifton and lively Saunders’ Rocks beaches. And if you’d like to do some sightseeing, it’s a 7-minute drive to must-hike Lion’s Head, and a 10-minute drive to both the unique Bo-Kaap Museum, which offers a peek into the city’s history, and the popular Two Oceans Aquarium.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Reserve a private oasis just outside Marrakech at Villa Grace. This charming vacation rental within view of the Atlas Mountains has resort-worthy outdoor areas, recently updated interiors and an attentive staff. Use it as a place to relax with family, for a getaway with friends to the two nearby golf courses, or as a base for exploring the city’s markets and museums.

Your holiday at Villa Grace begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a cook, butler, housekeeper and security staff. The residence sits on nearly three acres of manicured grounds, where you’ll find two swimming pools, a terrace with loungers and al-fresco dining for twelve. Inside, the villa boasts a hammam area with a sauna and hot tub, a pool table, a TV and Wi-Fi.

Polished stone floors and ornate moldings lend a traditional elegance to the villa’s several sitting areas—including two separated by a cozy wood-burning fireplace. Touches of red, orange and chocolate brown create a warm, inviting ambience. The dining area seats ten in a bright space that opens to the terrace, and while there is cook service, there is also a fully equipped kitchen.

There are four bedrooms in the main house at this luxury property and two in a guest house; all six have queen beds and en-suite bathrooms, and open to a terrace. With its separate accommodations, the guest house is perfect for a family traveling with younger children, in-laws wanting privacy or even a honeymoon-style retreat for a couple.

The peaceful enclave of Villa Grace is just a short drive from two golf courses and central Marrakech. If you can tear yourself away from the pools, it’s well worth browsing the city’s medina for a souvenir or two, exploring its museums and gardens, and sampling its restaurants.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Set in the heart of rolling fynbos country, guests at this luxurious oceanside villa can easily spot whales offshore from the nearby dunes. An enclosed courtyard reveals a striking blue pool with plush recliners and direct access to a fine dining area. Relax at the full bar, or in the glamorous sitting room after a day of beach hikes, wildlife spotting, fine dining, and picturesque scenery.

Arriving via swift helicopter transfer from Cape Town International or a scenic drive along the Garden route, guests will find a thoroughly modern villa that effortlessly blends into the landscape. Explore the rolling shrubland and tidal pools with guided nature walks, mountain bike outings, or exciting 4x4 drives. The peace and natural splendor of the reserve is best appreciated while watching whales breach the ocean surface from nearby high ground, or while night-time stargazing with a glass of locally-produced wine in hand. Take on immersive coastal activities like snorkeling and sand boarding that are included in your package, with experienced guides on-hand to instruct and help beginners.

This proximity of the reserve makes Morukuru Ocean House a great choice for travelers seeking to experience the famously diverse wildlife of South Africa. Setting out along the coastline, guests can picnic while spotting seals, dolphins, oystercatchers, sharks and a huge range of migratory birds. Further inland, admire herds of cape mountain zebras and bontebok antelope, before dropping by small towns in the vicinity to experience zesty seafood dishes and excellent South African barbecue.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Built in 1878 and once owned by one of the most powerful families on the island, this beautiful traditional two storey Santorini mansion is located in the heart of the picturesque village of Megalochori. Every aspect of this mansion is unique with heaps of character. Mansion 1878 consists of two spacious self-contained units with a private pool. From the village square, a small winding road leads to the mansion and into the large cobbled private courtyard, complete with pool and surrounded by potted shrubs and trees. A stone stairway leads up to the first floor with large terraces and panoramic views of the village on the horizon. This traditionally styled property sleeps up to 10 and children are welcome.

Outside Mansion 1878 the secluded swimming pool is hard to resist. You can also have the use of an electric barbecue (on request) if you’d like to do a bit of outdoor dining. Inside the property there are lots of modern amenities including satellite television and DVD player.

The original structure has been sensitively renovated. Restored to its original splendor, retaining the original layout and features, the gracious proportions and weathered building materials tell a real story and create the charm of this property. The well-equipped traditional-style central kitchen leads into the beautifully lit dining room, perfect for leisurely meals with friends and family. Arched doorways on either side of the kitchen allows for an easy flow through the house.

The spacious master bedroom is comfortable, bright and airy. A staircase leads to a private landing and second large double bedroom. An attractive bathroom with wood and stone features services both rooms. On the opposite end of the canava is a spacious sleeping area which allows for two double bedrooms with a shared seating and dressing area. The shared extravagant bathroom has a large shower, seating area and large vanity. A few steps away from the attractive pool you will find a separate spacious double room with en-suite shower room.

The village, shops and Megalochori Port are all within a short stroll of the property. The nearest beach is at Perivolos 5km away but is worth making the trip if you have transport. Mansion 1878 is only 12 km from the airport so you won’t have to wait long after touching down before you’re transported to a traditional Greek haven.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

feature.p: At the turn of the century, the first floor would have been occupied by the family with the ground floor serving as the winery and cellar. The Vinsanto dessert wine produced was exported to Russia, where it was used by the Russian Orthodox Church for Holy Communion. Unfortunately, this all came to an end with the Russian Revolution which had a big impact on the wealth of families in this once flourishing village.

The original structure has been sensitively renovated. Restored to its original splendor, retaining the original layout and traditional features, the gracious proportions and weathered building materials speak for themselves.

The ground floor once served as the 'canava' - wine cellar and workshop - of the Mansion. The cylindrical troughs sunk into the ground, once used for distilling the vinsanto, provides unusual lighting features to the interior. Three large barn-style doors lead from the cobbled courtyard into the various living areas. The smooth-edged carved interior provides a cool and relaxing haven during the hot summer days. The well equipped traditional-style central kitchen leads into the beautifully lit dining room, perfect for leisurely meals with friends and family. Arched doorways on either side of the kitchen allows for an easy flow through the house.

listing.listing_description:
Revel in the timeless beauty of the Greek hills and waters at the Elounda Aegean Pool Villa. This stunning vacation rental is set on a rise overlooking the Gulf of Mirabello on the northeastern coast of Crete, just outside the village of Elounda—a quiet area with a starkly lovely landscape. Enjoy the charming interiors, luxury amenities and three bedrooms with up to six friends or family members.

Your holiday at the villa includes complimentary breakfast and daily maid service. Follow the Aegean sun across the sky from a private terrace with a pool, hot tub, plenty of lounge chairs and an al-fresco dining area overlooking the sea. As night falls, stay out to stargaze, flip on the television or sound system, or join the Wi-Fi network to post your favorite snaps from the day.

Inside, the villa is the picture of traditional elegance—without skimping on modern convenience. Classic pieces like a roll-arm sofa and glass chandelier adorn the living and dining rooms, where there’s room for all six guests. The sleek, fully equipped kitchen is open to the other living spaces, making it easy to fetch a snack and a pleasure to prepare meals.

The exquisite master bedroom at the Elounda Aegean Pool Villa has a queen bed, en-suite bathroom and sea views. The other two bedrooms have two twin beds each and views of the garden, and share a bathroom. Hand-painted trompe l’oeil ceilings and marble accents extend the villa’s luxe traditional look even to its bathrooms.

As part of the Elounda Gulf Villas community, the property offers guests complimentary shuttle service to a private beach club, where you’ll find sunbeds, umbrellas, beach towels and, of course, Crete’s beautifully clear waters. Take a day trip to the charming fishing village of Elounda for a walk around the harbor or a meal at an oceanfront cafe, or to the livelier coastal town of Agios Nikolaos for a honeymoon-worthy dinner or a memorable night out.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Settle into a laid-back routine of beach time, braai and exploring Cape Town at Blinkwater Villa with a 5-star grading from the Tourism Grading Council of South Africa. Though it’s set on a leafy, residential cul-de-sac, this contemporary vacation rental is only a few minutes’ walk from Camps Bay and its beach, and a few minutes’ drive from highlights like Table Mountain and the city center. The architect-designed interiors and four suite-style bedrooms can be shared by up to eight guests.

Unwind in the shadow of Lion’s Head on private terraces with loungers and a pool, and alfresco dining for ten. Watch the stars come out over the mountains from the outdoor living areas or finish the evening inside around the TV and sound system, sharing photos of your day via Wi-Fi.

Sliding glass doors link the open-concept great room of Blinkwater Villa to the terraces for stunning views of the bay and hills. Sleek contemporary furnishings give the living and dining areas a feel of modern luxury, and, in the fully equipped kitchen, you’ll find stylishly minimal cabinets along with a practical breakfast bar and state-of-the-art appliances.

The villa’s four bedrooms, each with an en-suite bathroom, are well suited to groups of friends or extended family on holiday together. There are three with king beds and one with a queen bed; all open to terraces or a courtyards that have been thoughtfully landscaped with indigenous plants.

Nestled between Table Mountain and the Atlantic Ocean, Camps Bay is one of Cape Town’s trendiest areas—and Blinkwater Villa is in the heart of it. It’s only a 4-minute walk to the beach, which is popular with locals and visitors alike, and 10 minutes to the downtown area, where you can browse unique shops, grab a coffee at a hip new spot or book a honeymoon-worthy dinner at an oceanfront restaurant. With Table Mountain, Lion’s Head, the Twelve Apostles and central Cape Town all less than 15 minutes away by car, you’ll have no trouble exploring this vibrant city.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Blue, as you have never seen, is the only way to describe the Aegean Sea that captures within the basin at Santorini. This estate consists of 5 villas, creating a unique vision. The secluded, elegant rooms, the common areas, the water features singly, and as a combination are designed to blend and become art within the unusual nature of its surroundings. This place, these waters, this experience is one of a kind.

The natural phenomena of the caldera, which is comparable to the Grand Canyon, have villages built into the cliff face. And that is where you find the compound of Erosantorini. Its 3 levels are on the edge of a cliff. A magnificent infinity pool appears to go over the cliff’s edge and has a 180-degree view of the sea below, accompanied by underwater music.

Fireplaces hang from the ceilings. Polka dots cover bathroom vanities. It all blends into an unexpected statement as wild as the formations from the rock it’s built upon. There is a pool cave where you can socialize over coffee or cocktails. It’s all incredibly private and unique.This exclusive enclave allows one to celebrate the marriage of nature as art and art as nature. Erosantiorini is a mere 2 km south of Fira, the busy capital. Oia is a charming seaside village, only 14km away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Commanding an excellent spot above the much-loved fishing village of Agia Pelagia, this secluded villa is a great choice for a sunny stay in Crete. Plunge into the clear blue pool, or take in views of the nearby harbor, drink in hand, from the shaded terrace. Stylish interiors, with an emphasis on polished stone and wood convey modern luxury, while ancient sites and sandy beaches lie close by.

Get rapidly into the vacation spirit via the shaded exterior of this excellently-outfitted and modern villa, where a dreamy hammock swings amongst the tall pillars and warm stone. Inside, the sleek wooden surfaces and top-tier appliances of the kitchen ensures that guests can prepare and savor fresh meals with total convenience, while other luxury touches like the bedroom TVs, complete with sea view beyond, help to round out the La Roosa experience. The shining breakfast bar and quaint dining table, overhung by inventive art pieces, help to make meal-times a real pleasure, while the sheer expanse of the exterior areas are underlined during golden sunsets, when the Mediterranean light slants in to reflect warmly off the rich stone surfaces. At any time of day, the cushioned poolside recliner provides a peerless view of the nearby village.

La Roosa delivers an excellent combination of privacy, proximity to local amenities, and great access to the historical riches of Crete. Just a short drive from the local village, stock up on delicious local produce, fresh fish, organic wine and local delicacies, or make the drive to one of 3 local beaches in less than 10 minutes. The rich heritage of the island is yours to discover, with the exceptional ruined Frankish castle at Paliokastro being just 5 minutes away. Give the rich fishing heritage of this particular area, guests will be happy to note that some of the island’s most renowned seafood restaurants are very close by. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Hollywood Mansion is an extraordinary luxury villa in Camps Bay, perfectly located just eleven minutes from Cape Town and two minutes from the beach. Enjoying breathtaking views of the mountains and ocean, the stunning, California-style contemporary home features beautiful alfresco living spaces, exquisite interiors, and five deluxe king bedroom suites accommodating twelve (ten adults, two children). House keeping and butler services are included in your vacation rental. For families, groups of friends, and destination wedding guests seeking a unique experience of one of South Africa's finest locations, Hollywood Mansion is the ideal choice.

The villa features a main-floor terrace with open walls to the interior, as well private balconies adjoining all of the bedroom suites, providing ample space to savor the views and breeze. Enjoy dreamy days and evenings floating in the swimming pool, relaxing on sun loungers, and sipping champagne in the hot tub. Fire up the barbeque grill for a classic braai, and relish it around the alfresco table. Spend the afternoon in the lounge or swing chair, sipping a fine South African wine, or luxuriate in the canopied bed on the lawn.

The open walls to the interior create a seamless space for relaxation and entertainment. The living and dining areas enjoy an exquisite alfresco feel, while multiple fireplaces keep you toasty on cooler evenings. Mix cocktails at the superb bar, play a game of pool at the billiard table, and sit together in the sumptuous lounge. Prepare delicious meals in the fully equipped kitchen, serving appetizers at the counter, and gather around the beautiful dining table for a memorable feast. At night, withdraw to the home movie theater to watch your favorite films. The villa also includes a well-equipped exercise room with sprung wood floor, as well as a library for quiet study.

There are five outstanding bedrooms suites, all with king beds, private balconies, and ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone shower and bathtub. Additional bedding is available to accommodate two children.

Hollywood Mansion enjoys one the finest locations in Camps Bay. Just two minutes from Camps Bay Beach and five to Clifton Beach, you're also just an eleven-minute drive to downtown Cape Town. The iconic Lion's Head is five minutes away, while Table Mountain is about thirty-five.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located on the lush hillside of Clifton, South Africa, Twenty-One Nettleton is a six-bedroom boutique hotel, and if you’re thinking of hosting a special event, look no further. Nettleton features a friendly and helpful staff, spacious indoor and outdoor areas, and spectacular ocean views. The hotel’s six king en-suite bedrooms all have their own unique themes and private balconies, ensuring everyone in your party has their own secluded oasis. When it’s time to explore nearby Cape Town and Clifton Bay, Nettleton supplies a driver to make visiting the beaches, shopping centers, and restaurants even easier.

During your stay, you and your guests are sure to appreciate Nettleton’s thoughtfully chosen decor, consisting of designer furnishings and eclectic works of art. Ocean-view framing windows, balconies, and sitting areas are found throughout the interior, inviting Clifton’s beautiful environment to be ever-present within Nettleton’s walls. And, there’s a generous backyard area with an amazing view, lush gardens, and more living spaces for your large group.

Nettleton’s staff includes housekeepers, chef services, a butler, and driver, so you’ll have plenty of help with your special event. Daily snacks, breakfast, spirts, beer, and cocktails are also provided. At dinner, there is a formal dining area inside, or you could move the party out on to the terrace and dine under the stars. After, enjoy an evening dip in the swimming pool, or rejuvenate in the sauna. When you head back inside, curl up by the wood burning fireplace and have the entertainer in your group show off their skills at the grand piano.

Clifton Beach is the closest to Nettleton, barely a kilometer away. There, you’ll find pristine white sand, calm waters, and plenty of bars and restaurants just off the sand. To explore more of South Africa’s beautiful environment, consider a hike up Lion’s Head, which usually takes around two hours. At Lion’s Head peak there’s a small cafe and breathtaking views of the ocean and Table Mountains.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Stay where the mountains meet the sea at The Upper House. Perched on a hillside in the exclusive suburb of Camps Bay, this luxury vacation rental has expansive views of rocky cliffs and breaking ocean waves, plus a location close to beaches, shopping, dining and central Cape Town. Reserve this stunning home for a relaxed holiday with family or a getaway with up to eight friends.

Listen to the surf and feel the breeze off the water from the villa’s spacious ocean-facing terrace, which has space for sitting and lounging, a jacuzzi, a barbecue and al-fresco dining for six. In the evenings, challenge everyone to a game at the pool table or unwind after a day of sightseeing in front of the TV, DVD player and sound system.

The recently renovated interiors of The Upper House exude breezy sophistication. The main-level great room has a living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen that open to a balcony via fold-away glass doors, and refined furnishings in nautical tones of tan and blue sit under a soaring vaulted ceiling. A second living area on the lower terrace level features a sitting area, bar, TV lounge and kitchenette.

The villa has two bedrooms with king beds and access to the terrace, and two with queen beds and balconies; all four have private en-suite bathrooms and ocean views. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are flooded with sunshine and have an airy feel that’s boosted by white walls, sleek furnishings and geometric patterns on the bedding and accent pieces.

Though The Upper House is in the suburb of Camps Bay, it puts guests close to the best of what Cape Town has to offer. It’s less than 10 minutes from the villa to the iconic Lion’s Head and the white sands of Clifton and Camps Bay beaches—perfect for a honeymoon-style stroll, a refreshing swim or people-watching from the shore. A 15-minute drive or less will bring you to Table Mountain and the Cape Town city center.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Geneva House is a spectacular contemporary luxury villa in Camps Bay. Nestled amid the region's magnificent coastal mountains and hills, the villa enjoys an exceptional location just four minutes from Camps Bay Beach, Clifton Beach, and the iconic Lion's Head mountain, and about ten minutes from downtown Cape Town. Superb outdoor living areas combine with exquisite interiors and five deluxe bedroom suites to form an enchanting setting for family reunions and groups of friends.

The villa's multiple balconies enjoy sublime views of the Atlantic Ocean and Twelve Apostles mountain range, along with beautifully furnished spaces for savoring the sun and breeze. Dip your body in the beautiful swimming pool, cook a classic braai lunch at the wood-burning barbeque grill and relish it alfresco. Behold the horizon at the sunset hour in the sumptuous outdoor lounge.

A retractable wall joins the alfresco lounge with the open-concept interior, inviting the sublime ocean views into the home. The adjacent indoor/outdoor living areas create a lovely space for cocktail parties. Relax in the lounge in the evening, watching TV and sipping a fine South African wine. Gather for delectable feasts in the stunning dining room with spectacular ocean views. The villa's décor is exquisite throughout, with original, gallery-worthy artwork and design pieces evoking the consummate style of contemporary Cape Town. Additional features includes an office space, elevator, exercise room, heating and air conditioning, and fully equipped kitchen.

There are four bedrooms in the main house and one in the guesthouse. All four bedrooms in the main house feature double beds, balconies, and ensuite bathrooms. The guest house bedroom features a king bed and private entrance.

There is hardly a finer location in the area of Cape Town and Camps Bay for enjoying the area's world-class culture and natural beauty. From your private garage, you're just a four-minute drive to the nightlife and beach at Camps Bay, as well as Clifton Beach and Lion's Head Mountain. Table Mountain and the Atlantic Seaboard are both eleven minutes away, and you're just ten minutes from the heart of Cape Town.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The perfect antidote to the stress of modern life, River House gives you an unforgettable chance to get up close and personal with nature. Your private safari lodge is a gated property set high in the trees of the Madikwe Game Reserve in Morukuru. You can plan your own itinerary or draw on the knowledge of your private staff – a butler, chef, children’s nanny, ranger and tracker – to make the most of your unique bushveld experience.

Ideal for family groups or weddings and social events, River House can comfortably accommodate up to six adult guests and four children. Built with an emphasis on natural materials, it’s easy to imagine you’ve stumbled upon an ultra-luxurious treehouse deep in the African bush. Crowned by a vaulted thatched roof with stone fireplaces and feature walls, huge sliding windows bring the outside in at every opportunity. A hidden treetop infinity pool and wooden terrace festooned with lanterns is utterly magical and if you’re lucky you might even glimpse a monkey swinging through the branches while you swim or take an outdoor shower.

Mornings might be spent planning a personalized safari with your very own ranger over a freshly ground coffee or light breakfast prepared by your private chef. As the evenings draw in, gather your family around a crackling bonfire in the boma and recount your adventures deep into the night. When the excitement gets too much, you can retire to the peaceful comfort of the lounge. Plump up the cushions on the fireside sofa and settle in with the kids to watch a movie on the satellite television, or play a game together at the dining table.

King size beds and ensuite bathrooms with tubs and outdoor showers exude luxury while tree-shaded balconies offer a bird’s-eye perspective for contemplation of the landscape. All three double bedrooms afford spectacular views and there’s an air-conditioned children’s room with sofa bed.

The only dilemma you might have during your stay is how to fit in all the activities on offer in the locality. When you’re not stalking wild animals with your tracker in the game reserve, your staff can arrange excursions for you. Massage treatments, a water park, golf and live entertainment are all on offer at extra cost with advance notice. It’s an 84 km drive to Gaborone from your villa and 92 km to the airport.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
